topic.para: Benvenuti a Other Maemo Weather.
Other Maemo Weather (OMWeather) è un applet meteo per Nokia Internet Tablets. Esso può essere utilizzato per:

list.listitem: Check detailed weather forecast for up to 10 days
Update weather information automatically from the Internet (Data provided by weather.com)
Configure nearest weather station automatically using GPS
Facilmente personalizzato per selezionare stazione meteo ordinati dal menu a discesa
Vedere l'alba e il tramonto volte selezionato per stazioni meteorologiche
See current phase of the moon
Selezionare tra le diverse dimensioni icona, icona fissa, i colori e la modalità di visualizzazione
Vedere alcune caramelle con occhio trasparenza opzione

topic.para: Utilizzare il di usare le varie sezioni di questo documento di aiuto.
To activate OMWeather select Home Select applets... OMWeather.

First thing to do is select the position of a OMWeather applet in home view. You can change applet's position simply touching it and dragging it where you want it. Appearance of the applet can be changed from the Tool icon in OMWeathers weather window or selecting Home Applet settings OMWeather settings.
OMWeather will use the tablet's home city selection as a default location for weather data. Location can be changed from the Stations tab in OMWeathers settings window.
More info about how to change appearance of the applet and add, rename and delete locations can be found on the page.

The Settings dialog (accessible from the desktop applet or home view's Applet settings menu) provides access to the configurable options that controls how OMWeather appears and run. In addition to the tabs, there are also four buttons. Left arrow will take you to weather view, ok button saves settings, question mark opens help and x button closes settings window.
Stations tab lists all locations which weather data OMWeather will receive when the applet's refresh button is touched or automatic update happens.
Visuals tab is used to configure settings that controls visual appearance of the OMWeather.
Display tab is used to configure settings that control the number of visible items, its size and some other parameters of the OMWeather.
Units tab is used to select temperature, distance, wind speed and pressure units shown on weather data. Necessary units can be selected by clicking on corresponding check button.
Update scheda viene utilizzata per configurare l'aggiornamento di un intervallo di dati meteo. Questa scheda mostra anche il tempo quando prossimo aggiornamento sarà fatto.
Sensor tab is used control if temperature from the internal sensor is shown on the applet.
Left section allows you to rename and remove stations in the list. Up and down arrows allow you to change the order of the selected locations.
Right (Add) section allows you to add new weather stations, which will then be listed in the left view.
Enable GPS: check box is used to enable automatic weather station selection if GPS is enabled. This option works only for OS2008.
Visuals tab is used to configure settings that control the visual appearance of the OMWeather.
Layout: selects how icons are shown on the home screen. Possible selections are one row, one column, two rows, two columns or combination.

Icon set: selects which icon set is used. You can install more icon sets with the application manager (if Maemo extras repository is configured) or going to OMWeathers Maemo garage page (http://omweather.garage.maemo.org/) and downloading icon sets directly from there.
UI Theme Override selection allows to override theme settings.
Transparency: selection for OS2006-OS2007 will show background image behind the icons. For OS2008 this option allows to select percent for semi-transparency.
Font: defines font and it's size used by applet on the tablet home screen.
Font color: defines applet's font color. Touching color button will open Pick a Color dialog where it's possible to select font color.
Background color: setting defines the background color used for icons. For OS2006-OS2007 background color is not selectable if transparency is used.
Display tab is used to configure settings that control the number of visible items, its size and some other parameters of the OMWeather.
Visible items: selects how many icons will be shown in the tablet's home screen.
Icon size: defines icon size.
Show only current weather on first icon selection will show current weather on first icon and forecast for a rest of the day is shown on the next icon.
Swap hi/low temperature selection will change way how lowest and highest temperature for a day is shown on the applet. If selected, applet will show high temperature first.
Show wind selection will show wind speed and direction on the applet.
Show station name: selection will control if station names are shown on the applet.
Show arrows: selection will control if arrows used to change weather station are shown on the applet.
Units tab is used to select temperature, distance, wind speed and pressure units shown on weather data. Necessary units can be selected by clicking on corresponding check button.
Update scheda viene utilizzata per configurare l'aggiornamento di un intervallo di dati meteo. Questa scheda mostra anche il tempo quando prossimo aggiornamento sarà fatto.
Automatically updating data when connecting to the Internet: selection controls automatic weather data update when Internet connection is established.
Switch per la prossima stazione dopo: menu a discesa controlli tempo dopo applet modifiche alla prossima stazione meteo.
Valido per tempo meteorologiche correnti e intervallo di aggiornamento può essere selezionato da un menu a discesa.
Sensor tab is used control if temperature from the internal sensor is shown on the applet.

When Use device temperature sensor check box is enabled, applet will show temperature of the build in temperature sensor. Temperature can be shown after station name or on the new icon. Sensor read interwall can be set by user from range 1-30 minutes.

Touching icon of a day brings up a window where you can see current weather or detailed forecast for a selected day. On the Now tab you can see current weather and phase of the moon. Day tabs will show weather forecast and sunrise/sunset times for a selected days.
Tool button will open OMWeather settings dialog. Refresh button will update weather data, Question mark will open OMWeather info and X button closes weather dialog.
